author: ivan
msg: Follow-up to r1945: Fix compilation with MSVC.
* test/test_context.c
(test_ssltunnel_no_creds_cb): Remove empty array declaration and pass NULL
instead.

author: ivan
msg: Follow-up to r1820: Initialize CuTest structure properly.
* test/CuTest.c
(CuTestInit): Initialize t->setup, t->teardown and t->testBaton to NULL.

author: ivan
msg: Use serf built-in authentication in serf_get test utility.
* test/serf_get.c
(handler_baton_t): Add USERNAME, PASSWORD and AUTH_ATTEMPTS. Remvoe AUTHN.
(setup_request): Do not add authentication headers.
(credentials_callback): New.
(print_usage): Update help text.
(main): Handle new '-U' and '-P' options to accept username and
password. Configure authentication types and credentials callback.

author: gstein
msg: On the 1.2.x branch:
NOTE: r1948 and r1950 changed test/test_context.c in a conflicting
way. Those changes were discarded from this merge.

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue 83 - use the shorter relative uri instead of an absolute uri in
requests tunneled through an SSL tunnel.
* outgoing.c
(serf_request_bucket_request_create): Don't pass the host url to the request
bucket unless this is a request to a proxy.
* test/test_context.c
(test_setup_ssltunnel,
test_ssltunnel_basic_auth,
test_ssltunnel_digest_auth): Update the tests to expect the improved
behavior.
